subject: {{receiver.contact_name}}, you have been pre-approved for finance with Kanda

body.text: Hi {{receiver.contact_name}} - Congratulations! You've been pre-approved for a loan for your home imporvement.

rows.text: Now that you've been pre-approved, your job request has been shared with out network of tradespeople who will get in touch soon.

rows.subtext: We're here for you all the way. If you have any questions about the loan, or the job itself, please reach out to us at help@kanda.co.uk.
